en.courseTitle: AI for Developers â€” Lorenzo Bazzani
en.authorBio: 20+ years cloud infrastructure and AI. Seen too many PoCs die in production. Now I teach developers how to build AI that actually scales.
en.chaptersIntro: From 1950s AI to modern LLMs. History, architecture, Python, embeddings, RAG, agentic systems. Real code, real numbers, zero marketing slides.
en.guidesIntro: Technologies under the hood. Because copy-pasting from Stack Overflow isn't enough anymore.
